name: Soldier of Failure 2
description: Soldier of Failure 2 is the sequel of the 2D platformer with shooter elements. In which you again have to confront the new diverse enemies, their military equipment, and traps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
